member.summary: Delegate to handle the event on before http request. This event is raised before any network call is made, and can be used for logging, request modification, appending additional headers etc.
member.param: The source HttpClient that is going to make the network call
The underlying HttpRequest being sent over the network

member.name: T:BandwidthSdk.Standard.Http.Client.OnAfterHttpResponseEventHandler
member.summary: Delegate to handle the event on after http response. This event is raised after any network response is recieved, and can be used for logging, response modification, extracting additional information etc.
member.param: The source HttpClient that recieved the response from the network call
The underlying HttpResponse recieved from the network

member.name: E:BandwidthSdk.Standard.Http.Client.IHttpClient.OnBeforeHttpRequestEvent
member.summary: Event raised before an Http request is sent over the network This event can be used for logging, request modification, appending additional headers etc.

member.name: E:BandwidthSdk.Standard.Http.Client.IHttpClient.OnAfterHttpResponseEvent
member.summary: Event raised after an Http response is recieved from the network. This event can be used for logging, response modification, extracting additional information etc.
